description: Interact with your HackMD notes and teams seamlessly. Manage your notes, view reading history, and collaborate with team members using AI assistants. Simplify your note-taking experience with powerful API integrations.

hackmdApiUrl.description: Optional HackMD API URL, defaults to https://api.hackmd.io/v1

hackmdApiToken.description: Your HackMD API token for API authentication.
